Hello everyone! I am writting this in order to let you all know how to install this game correctly and have NO PROBLEMS! 
First af all I wanna thank the *Games4theworld* team for their torrents! 
I installed the game and played 3 hours with no problems. Here are the steps that i followed to install the whole game:

1. Downloaded The Sims 3 basic game (The *Games4theword* version). I installed it following the instructions given, but did NOT apply the crack. Then through the Sims 3 Launcher i downloaded the latest update.
2. Sims 3 World Adventures: DO NOT apply "Crack 4". Update to the latest version using the Sims 3 Launcher.
3. Sims 3 High End Loft Stuff: DO NOT apply the crack. Update to the latest version using the Sims 3 Launcher.
4. Sims 3 Ambitions: DO NOT apply any cracks. Update to the latest version.
5. Sims 3 Fast Lane Stuff: DO NOT apply any cracks. Update to the latest version.
6. Sims 3 Late Night: DO NOT apply any cracks. Update to the latest version.
7. Sims 3 Outdoor Living Stuff: Follow ALL the instuctions given step-by-step applying the crack.

That's all! I guarantee that this will work 100%! I hope you all enjoy the game! And thanks again to the *Games4theworld* team! :)

*Sims 3 World Adventures, High-End Loft Stuff, Ambitions, Fast Lane Stuff & Late Night are optional.

First, I want to thank you for all of your great uploads. I've never had any trouble with your other Sims 3 EP's/SP's until now.

I tried installing OLS about a week ago, but my game popped up with the standard "No Disc Can Be Found". After reading through the comments, I tried the fix provided on your website and I was able to make it all the way to choose which save I wished to play. Halfway through loading that save, my game crashed. I removed all of my mods etc and still it crashed. So, I uninstalled everything, restarted my computer, reinstalled my legal basegame, updated it and tried reinstalling everything as well as updated all of my mods. Now, I can get my saves to load, however I always get a pop up saying "You've added modifications that don't match with the core, etc etc, Uninstall or update them or your game may crash." I click continue and my game runs fine until I press my start button to get to my desktop (sometimes I multitask and switch from my game to something else). When I do this, my game closes down completely and I don't know why. I've never had this problem before installing OLS. Is there any fix for this? Should I have manually updated to a certain patch instead of updating all the way to 1.19? Or should I just uninstall everything and only install up to LN?

ill answer the question.

To install download PowerISO first then install.Download it from here somewhere.

Now once you have installed PowerISO the icon of what you want to use looks like a gold DvD.It is recolonized for use.Right click on your file an Set up around 4 mounts.Set this file as your Mount.

Now right click on the icon AGAIN an click Open.
This will load it too a temporary location which it will be safe to load.Click on Autorun or whatever .exe file must be loaded.

Let it load then it should run as a DvD.As long as it is mounted you cannot move the file so make sure it is in a area off your desktop.If you have multiple programs the other mounts will cover those.Mount the others with the options.

It is best to use this one
